decks.notes: The deck is focused on utilizing the combo of Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Transmogrify to cheat out powerful creatures and take control of the game. The deck also includes disruption in the form of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, as well as removal spells like Fatal Push and Heartless Act. The inclusion of Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Ob Nixilis, the Adversary provide additional threats and value to help secure victory. The mana base is built to support the combo and ensure consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on assembling the Amalia Life combo, utilizing cards like Aetherflux Reservoir and Collected Company to gain life and generate powerful combos. The deck also includes various creatures and spells that support the combo strategy, such as Prosperous Innkeeper and Mana Confluence. Overall, the goal is to quickly build up life total and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful combo finish. The inclusion of cards like Skyclave Apparition and Chord of Calling provides additional versatility and control options to deal with threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with devotion to green creatures and enchantments, allowing for explosive plays and overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats. The deck focuses on playing large creatures like Cavalier of Thorns and Old-Growth Troll, supported by cards like Storm the Festival and Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner to generate even more value. The inclusion of cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Lair of the Hydra provide additional utility and flexibility in dealing with opposing threats. Overall, the deck aims to dominate the battlefield and close out games quickly.
